openf1_1758139508.summary:
OpenF1 is an open-source API that provides real-time and historical Formula 1 data. The API offers a wealth of information, including lap timings, car telemetry, radio communications, and more. Historical data is freely accessible and requires no authentication. Real-time data access requires a paid account. Data can be accessed in either JSON or CSV formats.

## API endpoints

### Car data
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/car_data`
- **Description**: Provides data about each car at a sample rate of about 3.7 Hz.
- **Attributes**: brake, date, driver_number, drs, meeting_key, n_gear, rpm, session_key, speed, throttle.

### Drivers
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/drivers`
- **Description**: Provides information about drivers for each session.
- **Attributes**: broadcast_name, country_code, driver_number, first_name, full_name, headshot_url, last_name, meeting_key, name_acronym, session_key, team_colour, team_name.

### Intervals
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/intervals`
- **Description**: Fetches real-time interval data between drivers and their gap to the race leader.
- **Attributes**: date, driver_number, gap_to_leader, interval, meeting_key, session_key.

### Laps
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/laps`
- **Description**: Provides detailed information about individual laps.
- **Attributes**: date_start, driver_number, duration_sector_1, duration_sector_2, duration_sector_3, lap_duration, lap_number, meeting_key, session_key.

### Location
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/location`
- **Description**: The approximate location of the cars on the circuit.
- **Attributes**: date, driver_number, meeting_key, session_key, x, y, z.

### Meetings
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/meetings`
- **Description**: Provides information about meetings (Grand Prix or testing weekend).
- **Attributes**: circuit_key, circuit_short_name, country_code, country_key, country_name, date_start, gmt_offset, location, meeting_key, meeting_name, year.

### Overtakes (beta)
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/overtakes`
- **Description**: Provides information about overtakes during races.
- **Attributes**: date, meeting_key, overtaken_driver_number, overtaking_driver_number, position, session_key.

### Pit
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/pit`
- **Description**: Provides information about cars going through the pit lane.
- **Attributes**: date, driver_number, lap_number, meeting_key, pit_duration, session_key.

### Position
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/position`
- **Description**: Provides driver positions throughout a session.
- **Attributes**: date, driver_number, meeting_key, position, session_key.

### Race control
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/race_control`
- **Description**: Provides information about race control incidents.
- **Attributes**: category, date, driver_number, flag, lap_number, meeting_key, message, scope, sector, session_key.

### Sessions
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/sessions`
- **Description**: Provides information about sessions during a Grand Prix.
- **Attributes**: circuit_key, circuit_short_name, country_code, country_key, country_name, date_end, date_start, gmt_offset, location, meeting_key, session_key, session_name, session_type, year.

### Weather
- **Endpoint**: `GET https://api.openf1.org/v1/weather`
- **Description**: The weather over the track, updated every minute.
- **Attributes**: air_temperature, date, humidity, meeting_key, pressure, rainfall, session_key, track_temperature, wind_direction, wind_speed.

## Data filtering
- Results can be filtered by any attribute, except arrays.

## CSV Format
- To receive results in CSV format, append `csv=true` to your URL.

## Tutorials
- Various tutorials available for creating dashboards and streaming data.

## FAQ
- Real-time data requires a paid account.
- API updates typically occur about 3 seconds after live events.

## Community and Support
- Engage with the community on GitHub Discussions.
